title: Life is boring sometimes. What are some interesting things or hobbies? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here are things I do for a hobby 1. Write a story 2. Play an RPG 3. Draw a comic 4. Create a plan/blueprint to create an rpgs 5. Make voodoo dolls out of crochet yarns 6. Read books 7. Work out.  8. Write 10 ideas.  9. Clean my room.  10. Document the show you're watching.  11. Learn how to create a website.  12. Learn how to draw.

I started learning Russian a year ago. I found a few people on MyLanguageExchange with whom I'm practising weekly in return for help with French. Russian works fundamentally different from English or French, which makes it quite interesting to learn for anyone who likes to look at things (in this case, languages) from a different perspective. Plus, I get to talk with interesting people with various life experiences and various backgrounds. And I even get to practice my communication skills. Yeh! Learning a language is certainly something you can enjoy and something you can benefit a lot from.
